Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection--Series 27. Pennsylvania Railroad--Sub-Series 1. Menus

Items on menu: Sandwiches ; Meals served: Snacks. Representative dishes: Cold Roast Beef Sandwich, Pickle Chips and Two Slices of Tomato ($2.35). Imported Sardine Sandwich, Pickle Chips and Two Slices of Tomato ($1.60)

Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections

The Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection consists of 238 items: 227 menus and eleven pamphlets. 35 United States and Canadian railroads are represented in the collection. All menus were issued by their respective railroad.
